cast.name: 何塞·科罗纳多 José Coronado
路易斯·卡叶赫 Luis Callejo

director.name: 贝伦·马西亚斯 Belén Macías

introduction: Summer 2010, Spain has just won its first FIFA World Cup, and Police Inspector María Ruíz is investigating the relationship between a male teenager murdered at a park in Madrid and another one who disappeared in Pamplona. When the latter is also found dead, María discovers that he was a student from a school where there have been child abuse cases, and that both youngsters went at the same time to the summer camp organized by that teaching center. In Madrid, she gets together with veteran journalist Luna, who is also investigating the case and gives to her a clue about the assassin’s identity.
